name: Capsular
description: Capsular is a unique arena shooter featuring a "One shot, One Kill" mechanic. Jump into a fast paced match where your skill matters most!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit or better Processor: 3.1 GHz Processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
